# ReflectionHelpers.IsRequiredTypeDelegate delegate

Delegate to allow to determine that the type meets required conditions.

```csharp
public delegate bool IsRequiredTypeDelegate(Type type);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| type | Type to check. |

## Return Value

True when the type matches required conditions.
